documentation.text:
@title Decentralized Voting System with Delegation
 @dev This contract allows users to vote directly or delegate their votes.
@notice Represents a voter with voting rights and delegation status
@notice Represents a proposal with a name and vote count

devdoc.details: This contract allows users to vote directly or delegate their votes.

devdoc.title: Decentralized Voting System with Delegation

constructor.notice: Deploys the contract and initializes proposals

delegate(address).notice: Delegates the sender's vote to another voter

giveRightToVote(address).notice: Grants voting rights to an address

vote(uint256).notice: Casts a vote for a proposal

winnerName().notice: Returns the name of the winning proposal

winningProposal().notice: Determines the winning proposal based on vote count
